name: GDevelop 5 - WTF Wars - Grid turn based template
name_original: GDevelop 5 - WTF Wars - Grid turn based template
description:
WTF Wars is a grid turn based template easily to understand pretty much documented with a lot of features of GDevelop used.

A pretty much basic chaotic coded template for a turn based game in GDevelop 5

Controls:

  1. Use the mouse left: to select a unit, and right click to deselect.
  2. Use left click to move with the unit grid.
  3. Once you moved you can select again the unit to display his/her attack range.
  4. If the attack range can target an enemy you need to use left click to select the enemy then press attack.
  5. Camera has two modes field and player toggle to field and use the mousewheel to explore.

Debug:

  • Return or Enter - Restart the game.
  • Space Ends your turn and reset all the enemies moves.
